title: New Dream Hunter Rem: Setsuriku no Mudenmekyu

synonyms: New Dream Hunter Rem: Massacre in the Phantasmic Labyrinth
alternative_titles.ja: NEW DREAM HUNTER 麗夢 殺戮の夢幻迷宮

synopsis: Rem is an ordinary woman in our world but, in the world of dreams, she becomes a dream warrior, defending humanity from the evils there. When dream demons reach the waking world, she fights them with the help of her pets which transform into a tiger and wolf.
